sentence.Network_en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentence.Network_cn: 本文中大多数的经历都和癌症有关。

sentence.Network_en: Neither party is willing to compromise and herein lies the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 双方都不愿意妥协，问题就在这里。

entry.def: Herein means in this document, text, or book.

example.ex: The statements and views expressed herein are those of the author and are not necessarily those of the Wilson Centre...
example.tran: 本书中的陈述和观点为作者个人意见，不一定代表威尔逊中心的看法。

example.ex: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view...
example.tran: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

entry.def: You can use herein to refer back to the situation or fact you have just mentioned, when saying it is something such as a problem or reason for something.

example.ex: The point is that people grew unaccustomed to thinking and acting in a responsible and independent way. Herein lies another big problem.
example.tran: 关键是人们已不再习惯以一种负责任的、独立的方式去思考和行动。这其中就存在另一个大问题。

means.word_mean: 1. in this place or thing or document;
